password_too_weak: Password too weak. Must contain uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters, and be at least 8 characters long
tenant_exists: Tenant name or identifier already exists
group_cannot_be_own_parent: Group cannot be its own parent
sso_token_invalid: SSO token is invalid or missing required fields
user_or_tenant_missing: Request is missing user or tenant information

sessionid_required: SessionId required for user token refresh
too_many_login_attempts: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again later
service_unavailable: Service temporarily unavailable, please try again later
